Reviews.Title: Low Price...So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Steven Naylor
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a good basic flat screen to hang in bedroom just big enough to be functional but small enught o tuck out of the way when not in use.  So far this set has worked out great.  Don't know what the long-term will be as far as dependability but for now, I love it. Great picture...everything we needed

Reviews.Title: makes a super good computer screen.
Reviews.Author: jantzandco
Reviews.Content: i received this product in very good packaging and had it connected to my mac mini within minutes. it sets up very easy and provides a very clear picture quality. the speakers aren't even that bad. my only problem is that i wish i had gotten a bigger one.. i might possibly buy another one and connect them.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Jairo
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv. Good quality. It is overall a great product and i am glad that i bought this. Very pleased with it.

Enjoy video in stunning high-resolution 720p

Built-in digital TV tuner (ATSC/NTSC/QAM) - HDMI digital connection delivers perfect signal transmission
PC VGA connection for use as a computer monitor - Premium sound powered by SRS Labs
Digital noise reduction - V-chip parental control, Closed-Caption, and Electronic Porgram Guide support
